title: All This Making Love
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Barry Gibb]
About an hour or more
When I go upstairs
You can read between the lines
I can make it to the top
But then I gotta stop
But I'm all right
[Hook: Robin Gibb]
I'm really fine
It's just the wine
And all this making love
[Verse 2: Barry Gibb]
In a day or so
It'll really show
Gonna wear me to the ground
It's just the way it goes
She keeps me on my toes
But I'm all right
[Hook - Variation: Robin Gibb]
And should I mind
It's just the wine
And all this making love

[Verse 3: Barry Gibb]
And I can't keep still
Gonna make a will
'cause I'm losing all my hair
I try to make it seem
It isn't just a dream
And I'm all right
[Hook - Variation: Robin Gibb]
I'm almost there
It isn't fair
To wake up all this making love
[Verse 4: Barry Gibb]
I get pleasure and pain
It's a gravy train
It's a wonderland, it's a ride
And the rumor is I'm told
She's really got a hold
And I'm all right
[Hook: Robin Gibb]
[Verse 5: Barry Gibb]
She'll be making me strung by the tip of my tongue
Like a tiger in a cage
She's got me up a wall
I'm slowing to a crawl
But I'm all right

[Hook: Robin Gibb]
[Outro: Barry Gibb]
Too much too much too much too much...
